thread.title: ‘Think tank’ says shuttered school could be rented, repurposed
thread.title_full: ‘Think tank’ says shuttered school could be rented, repurposed | Newsday

author: Denise M. Bonilla
title: ‘Think tank’ says shuttered school could be rented, repurposed
text:
The Lindenhurst school board is pondering the future of Bower Elementary School, which was closed in 2011. Oct. 18, 2016 (Credit: Newsday / Thomas A. Ferrara) 

A think tank tasked with coming up with a solution for a shuttered elementary school in Lindenhurst is largely recommending renting or re-purposing the building. 
The think tank results were announced last week at a board of education meeting that at times grew heated between those with differing opinions on what should be done with Edward W. Bower Elementary School on Montauk Highway. Last...
